text: Zilpha Keatley Snyder (May 11, 1927 â€“ October 8, 2014) was an American author of books for children and young adults. Three of Snyder's works were named Newbery Honor books: The Egypt Game, The Headless Cupid and The Witches of Worm. Snyder died in San Francisco, California from a stroke, aged 87.Obituary: Zilpha Keatley Snyder ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Writers from California
title: Zilpha Keatley Snyder
